"Distress Signal Investigation":
"An unknown distress signal has been
detected from the Lillipa tunnels. While it
may simply be a malfunctioning machine,
this is too important to leave to chance.

Go to the tunnels and find the signal's
origin, but note: many Lillipans have been
seen in the area.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Fail the rescue mission."
